All Classes

Class Description
BencodeParser
This class parses Bencoding and returns a HashMap of the values.
BitfieldOperations
A small class containing methods to operate on bits contained within bytes
ChannelData
This class holds information about the state of a channel, including information such as whether it is working on a piece, whether it is being choked and messages it needs to send
ConsoleFormatter
A custom formatter that colours logs to make them more readable.
FileFormatter
A custom formatter that directs logs to an output file
FlowControls
In order to control what actions a channel or torrent file needs to take it will always be given a status.
FlowControls.ChannelStatus
A series of statuses used in code control statements within NIOThread.
FlowControls.TorrentStatus
A series of statuses used in code control statements within NIOThread.
NIOThread
This class runs as a new Thread and handles all the I/O operations as the client goes about its work.
Peer
This class represents information about Peers that the client may connect to
PeerManager
This class acts as a container for Peer objects, storing and distributing them when required
PiecePicker
An abstract class for subclassing.
RarestFirst
an implementation of PiecePicker, this class prioritises pieces based on their availability, with the rarest pieces being targetted first
TClient
The fa√ßade class used to initiate a download for the client
TorrentFile
This class holds information related to the torrent file being downloaded
TorrentFile.PieceSelectionPolicy
Enumerations representing the possible piece selection policies.
